name: OBLITERATRON
description:
This is a game I finished working on in 2012-04-21. Using pygame, aaand, that's pretty much it.

Numbers 1 to 3 switch the type of weapon (match weapon colour to city colour)

Letters Q, W, E 'vent' each weapon, allowing them to recharge faster.

Every city has an AOE effect on others (the translucent cube around each city).

Unzip the file, open the dist directory, double click 'beginnerGame.exe"
